title: Alterations
fullText:
Alterations to electrical installations of site supplies for connectable electrical installations shall comply with all relevant provisions of this Standard.
Alterations to electrical installations shall not cause any portion of the original electrical installation, or electrical equipment connected thereto, to â€”
(a) carry currents or sustain voltages in excess of those permitted by this Standard; or
(b) be used in any manner that is not in accordance with this Standard.
